resources.string: An example of the custom SwipeRefreshLayout which does not intercept horizontal swipe gesture. So ViewPager can be used as a part of list elements.
This is the variant with the standard SwipeRefreshLayout from the support library
This is the variant with the extended SwipeRefreshLayout (previous wide-spread Stack Overflow answers).
This is my implementation of the swipe-to-refresh widget, which allows scrollable containers as a content (based on the support library code).
